subject: Football (College)
Bowl Games
lead_paragraph: James Conner rushed for 229 yards and Chris Blewitt kicked a field goal with 1 minute 17 seconds left, lifting the Panthers to a 30-27 win over Bowling Green in the Little Caesars Pizza Bowl in Detroit.
snippet: James Conner rushed for 229 yards and Chris Blewitt kicked a field goal with 1 minute 17 seconds left, lifting the Panthers to a 30-27 win over Bowling Green in the Little Caesars Pizza Bowl in Detroit.
